EmailTemplate.name: EMEA_Event_Pivotal Kubernetes Workshop South_EU_Q119.Milan 28/03 Morning - Follo
EmailTemplate.subject: Thank you for attending our Kubernetes Workshop
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {{lead.First Name:default=}},
Thanks for attending our Kubernetes Workshop. We hope you came away with new insights on how to address the challenges of Day 2 Kubernetes management in your enterprise. The presentations from the workshop are now available: P to V to C <[[https://www.slideshare.net/secret/2fo8t8NBgHetGT]]> Kube Your Enthusiasm <[[https://www.slideshare.net/secret/dYkETE9scYU6xC]]> Run Kubernetes in Production with vSphere and PKS <[[https://www.slideshare.net/secret/qa2HCm1v7pPlzt]]>
This microsite <[[https://content.pivotal.io/pivotal-kubernetes-workshops-2019?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=followup-email-emea-milan-morn-Q119&utm_term=uf]]> has a wealth of blogs, talks and videos about building an enterprise-ready Container-as-a-Service that will enable you to support Kubernetes in a stable, scalable and secure way, across all clouds.
Download <[[https://network.pivotal.io/products/pivotal-container-service/?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=followup-email-emea-milan-morn-Q119&utm_term=pks]]> Pivotal Container Service (PKS) to get you started!
Thank you, VMware & Pivotal Team
P.S. - If you want to learn more on how to build and run software faster for the future, please join us on the road at SpringOne Tour <[[https://springonetour.io/2019/paris?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=followup-email-emea-milan-morn-Q119&utm_term=s1t]]>. The event takes place May 23-24 in Paris.
